city: Charlotte Amalie-Cyril E. King (ex Harry S. Truman)
circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from Charlotte Amalie-Harry S. Truman Airport, while climbing, the twin engine aircraft disappeared and crashed in unknown circumstances. SAR operations were conducted but eventually suspended few days later as no trace of the aircraft nor the three occupants was found. It is believed the airplane may have crashed into the sea.
probable_cause: Due to lack of evidence, the cause of the accident could not be determined.
